results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores as Juventus beat Bologna to extend their lead in Serie A.
results.title: Juventus 2-1 Bologna: Ronaldo goal helps Juventus extend Serie A lead

results.description: Bologna manager Sinisa Mihajlovic makes an emotional return to the dugout despite being diagnosed with leukaemia just six weeks ago.
results.shortTitle: Mihajlovic back in dugout for Bologna
results.title: Sinisa Mihajlovic leads Bologna after six weeks of chemotherapy

results.description: Bristol City sign Hungary midfielder Adam Nagy from Bologna on a three-year deal, as well as Stoke City striker Benik Afobe on a season's loan.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City sign Bologna's Nagy & Stoke's Afobe
results.title: Bristol City sign Hungarian midfielder Adam Nagy from Bologna & Stoke striker Benik Afobe on season-long loan

results.description: Bologna coach Sinisa Mihajlovic vows to "win this battle" as he announces he will receive treatment for leukaemia.
results.title: Sinisa Mihajlovic: Bologna boss vows to recover from leukaemia

results.description: Dany Mitzman hates football but her partner loves it. That isn't a problem until their daughter is about to go to her first game...
results.shortTitle: The day I had to watch a sport I hate
results.title: Beautiful game? The day I had to watch a sport I hate

thumbnail.altText: Dany Mitzman is not finding the match entertaining

results.description: Ten-man AC Milan keep alive their hopes of a Champions League place with a 2-1 win against Bologna, who had two players sent-off in the 96th minute.
results.title: AC Milan 2-1 Bologna: Three sent off as Gattuso's side keep alive top-four hopes

results.description: Unbeaten Serie A leaders Juventus need a goal from substitute Paulo Dybala to beat Bologna 1-0.
results.shortTitle: Dybala scores as Juventus beat Bologna
results.title: Bologna 0-1 Juventus: Paulo Dybala scores as Serie A champions win

results.description: Serie A strugglers Bologna sack coach Filippo Inzaghi and replace him with former coach Sinisa Mihajlovic.
results.shortTitle: Inzaghi replaced by Mihajlovic at Bologna
results.title: Filippo Inzaghi replaced by Sinisa Mihajlovic as Bologna manager

results.description: Napoli supporters hold aloft posters and banners in support of defender Kalidou Koulibaly before their Serie A match against Bologna.
results.title: Kalidou Koulibaly: Napoli fans show support before game against Bologna

results.description: Serie A leaders Juventus beat Bologna to claim a seventh straight win, their best start to a season in 88 years.
results.shortTitle: Juventus make best start in 88 years
results.title: Juventus 2-0 Bologna: Juve win seventh straight game to start season

results.description: Watford make their fourth signing of the summer as Bologna defender Adam Masina joins the club for a reported £3.5m.
results.title: Watford sign Italian defender Adam Masina from Bologna

results.description: Inter Milan end the 10-game winless run that has derailed their season as they beat Bologna in Serie A.
results.title: Inter Milan 2-1 Bologna

results.description: Dries Mertens scores twice as Napoli recover from falling behind after 24 seconds to beat Bologna and return to the top of Serie A.
results.title: Napoli 3-1 Bologna

thumbnail.altText: Napoli's players celebrate scoring against Bologna

results.description: AC Milan win for the first time under new boss Gennaro Gattuso thanks to Giacomo Bonaventura's double against Bologna.
results.title: AC Milan 2-1 Bologna

results.description: Bologna and Ghana midfielder Godfred Donsah says he would go on strike to show solidarity with Sulley Muntari because racism is "killing the game".
results.shortTitle: Donsah willing to strike for Muntari
results.title: Sulley Muntari: Bologna's Godfred Donsah willing to strike to show solidarity

results.description: Edin Dzeko scores his 34th goal of the season as Roma beat Bologna to maintain their slim Serie A title hopes.
results.title: Bologna 0-3 Roma

results.description: Marek Hamsik and Dries Mertens score hat-tricks as Napoli thrash Bologna 7-1 and record their biggest-ever Serie A away win.
results.title: Bologna 1-7 Napoli

thumbnail.altText: Lorenzo Insigne, Dries Mertens and Marek Hamsik
